DOC.brief_summary: This study propose compare two innovative treatment approach LBP , focus deliver individualize care evidence-based , clinical care pathway . The primary aim project determine relative clinical efficacy 1 ) chiropractic care 2 ) multidisciplinary , integrative care 200 patient sub-acute chronic LBP , short-term ( 12 week ) long-term ( 52 week ) . The primary outcome measure study patient-rated back pain . Chiropractic care include therapy within professional scope practice . Integrative , multidisciplinary care include chiropractic , massage therapy , traditional Chinese medicine ( include acupuncture ) , medication , cognitive behavioral therapy , exercise , patient education . Secondary aim assess group difference frequency symptom , disability , fear avoidance behavior , self efficacy , general health , improvement , patient satisfaction , work loss , medication use , lumbar dynamic motion , torso muscle endurance . Patients ' provider ' perception treatment describe use qualitative method cost-effectiveness cost utility assess short- long-term . This innovative study excite collaboration experience establish team chiropractic , conventional , CAM professional dedicate advance care pervasive costly LBP condition . This trial provide new important information health care provider LBP patient , inform decision make improve care delivery system .
DOC.brief_title: Individualized Chiropractic Integrative Care Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Mechanical LBP classify 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 use Quebec Task Force ( QTF ) classification.70 ( This include back pain , stiffness tenderness without musculoskeletal neurological sign ) . LBP localize posterior aspect body , costal margin inferior gluteal fold .
